about.heading: About Me
about.title: Main information about me
about.intro1-1: . I was originally a refrigeration engineer from University of Science and Technology, but I have a passion for programming so I want to pursue the path that I love.
about.intro-2: I'm known as a detail-oriented and good communicator employee. I never miss deadlines and can take multiple tasks at once.I have the ability to work independently as well as effectively in a team. My hobbies are reading book, coding, play soccer and listening to music. Sometimes I like to go out drinking with my colleagues.
about.intro-3: Right now I don't have much experience, so I would like to apply for the position of intern/fresher Frontend Developer to explore new dimensions and for the further development of my skills. My short term goal is that I  want to be a part of a Frontend team, to build products that can show my skills, grow my career and my long term goal is to be a Senior Frontend Developer.
about.intro-4: That's my introduction. Thanks for reading.
